page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW/BLOCK03280351
page.content: Our D-block is mainly comprised of agricultural land and a number of linked villages({Gwersyllt,Pentre {Broughton,New Broughton, Tanyfron, {Brymbo and parts of Coedpoeth )}which grew up around local industry such as coal mining and steelmaking.These at one time were the major employers within the area. However,coalmining as an industry does not exist within the block and Brymbo Steelworks is now producing high grade,low alloy steel employing a much reduced workforce. Agricultural land within the area falls into two main categories-rough grazing and grass grown for silage or hay.Farming is concentrated on dairy cattle and sheep rearing. High unemployment within the area has led to an increased demand for leisure facilities.
